scripts.clean: rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/haste-* && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && yarn cache clean --force
scripts.stop: lsof -n -i4TCP:8081 | sed '1 d' | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill -9
scripts.se: yarn clean && yarn clean-ios && node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js run-ios --simulator="iPhone SE (12.4)"
scripts.xs: yarn clean && yarn clean-ios && node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js run-ios --simulator="iPhone Xs (12.4)"
